titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Penn State University women's volleyball team for winning the 2013 National Collegiate Athletic Association Women's Volleyball Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/4/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the Penn State University women's volleyball team for winning the 2013 National Collegiate Athletic Association Championship.
